org.apache.giraph.graph

类 VertexMutations<I extends org.apache.hadoop.io.WritableComparable,V extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable,E extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable,M extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.giraph.graph.VertexMutations<I,V,E,M>
  • 类型参数:
    I - Vertex index value
    V - Vertex value
    E - Edge value
    M - Message value
    所有已实现的接口:
    ImmutableClassesGiraphConfigurable, VertexChanges<I,V,E,M>, org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable

    public class VertexMutations<I extends org.apache.hadoop.io.WritableComparable,V extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable,E extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable,M extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable>
extends Object
implements VertexChanges<I,V,E,M>, org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable, ImmutableClassesGiraphConfigurable
    Structure to hold all the possible graph mutations that can occur during a superstep.
